content.description:
Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes. If the question prompts you to “Calculate,” you must show how you arrived at your final answer.

Use the following graph to answer parts (a)-(e). Prices and costs are in dollars.

The graph above shows the demand (<math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>), marginal revenue (<math alttext="M R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>), marginal cost (<math alttext="M C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>), and average total cost (<math alttext="A T C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>T</mi><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>) curves for one of many profit-maximizing firms operating in the short run in an industry in which there are no barriers to entry. Each firm sells a similar but not identical product.

(a) What will happen to total revenue if the firm raises the price from <math alttext="$32" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>32</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="$36" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>36</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>? Explain.

(b) At <math alttext="30" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> units, is the firm producing at the allocatively efficient quantity? Explain.

(c) If the firm produces <math alttext="40" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>40</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> units, will the firm’s economic profit be positive, negative, or zero? Explain.

(d) Use the relationship between the marginal cost curve and the average total cost curve to explain why the average total cost curve is decreasing at <math alttext="20" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> units.

(e) Calculate the consumer surplus if the firm charges the profit-maximizing price. Show your work.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.
